title: Mirror of Germany. No. 160 = Deutschland Spiegel
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Cities and towns
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Germany - Social life and customs
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Natural disasters
description: Episode of Series "Mirror of Germany. The German Scene = Deutschland Spiegel". Magazine items: New Year storms on the North Sea coast cause Greek freighter to run aground; Altona has a folklore museum devoted to relics of the sea; new fertilizer factory built by Germans in the Andes of Peru; "People, Animals, Sensations" - traditional annual show by international artists; a very modern cake bakery; the Euroopean Heavyweight Championship fight; romantic songs at the Philharmonic and a new hall at the Technical University in Berlin; the old city centre at Munster rebuilt; an art exhibition; volunteer fire brigade drill; skittles and bowling; and 15 nations compete in Bavaria as a prelude to the ski jumping season.
